item.name: Values processed by Zabbix server per second

trigger.name: Less than 5% free in the value cache
Less than 25% free in the configuration cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing CacheSize in the zabbix_server.conf configuration file

trigger.name: Less than 25% free in the history cache
Less than 25% free in the text history cache
Less than 25% free in the trends cache
Less than 25% free in the vmware cache
More than 100 items having missing data for more than 10 minutes
trigger.description: zabbix[queue,10m] item is collecting data about how many items are missing data for more than 10 minutes (next parameter)

trigger.name: Zabbix alerter processes more than 75% busy

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0&{Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,configuration syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75)|({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1&{Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,configuration syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix configuration syncer processes more than 75% busy

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0&{Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,db watchdog,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75)|({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1&{Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,db watchdog,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
trigger.name: Zabbix db watchdog processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix discoverer processes more than 75% busy
Zabbix escalator processes more than 75% busy

trigger.expression: ({TRIGGER.VALUE}=0&{Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,history syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>75)|({TRIGGER.VALUE}=1&{Template App Zabbix Server:zabbix[process,history syncer,avg,busy].avg(10m)}>65)
